thread.title: Brooklyn Nets And BlueRock Energy Ready To Tip-off 2nd Year Of Partnership

author: cbs8
title: Brooklyn Nets And BlueRock Energy Ready To Tip-off 2nd Year Of Partnership
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE BlueRock Energy
Leading energy services company announces new promotions, giveaways and content for fans and businesses in New York Metro region as it enters second consecutive season as proud supporting partner of the NBA's Brooklyn Nets
BROOKLYN , N.Y. and SYRACUSE, N.Y. , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- BlueRock Energy , an award-winning energy solutions company that provides electricity, natural gas and renewable energy products to businesses and residential customers across New York , Connecticut and Pennsylvania , today announced that it is entering its second consecutive season as a Proud Supporting Partner of the Brooklyn Nets .
As BlueRock Energy enters the second season of its partnership with the Brooklyn Nets, the company is planning to introduce a variety of promotional efforts and exclusive fan engagement initiatives. All of the initiatives are geared toward enhancing the pre-game, in-game, and post-game experience for Nets fans in attendance as well as those who follow the Nets away from the arena. Among the initiatives that BlueRock Energy plans to support this season are:
"Brooklyn Stand-Up Moment" : For the second consecutive season, Nets fans will get to experience the "Brooklyn Stand-Up Moment" on the center hung scoreboard at Barclays Center, the home of the Brooklyn Nets. The "Brooklyn Stand-Up Moment" is a unique and fun way to get fans into the game and out of their seats as the fourth quarter is starting. It is led by Nets P.A. announcer David Diamente . Exclusive Social Media Promos and Giveaways : Each month Nets fans will have the opportunity to participate in an exclusive BlueRock Energy social media contest and giveaway on Twitter. Fans will have the opportunity to receive exclusive Nets prizes, giveaways and memorabilia throughout the season, courtesy of BlueRock Energy. Brooklyn Blue Nights Presented by BlueRock Energy : Following the success of last season, "Brooklyn Blue Nights" are back this season at Barclays Center, sponsored by BlueRock Energy. For six games, Barclays Center will turn blue for "Brooklyn Blue Nights". In celebration of Brooklyn's rich heritage and tradition, the Nets will wear grey jerseys trimmed in blue, and fans will be encouraged to turn Barclays Center into a sea of Brooklyn blue pride. Dates for Brooklyn Blue Nights Presented by BlueRock Energy are as follows: 11/17, 12/1, 12/8, 1/26, 3/15, 3/22. WFAN Radio Promotions and Arena Signage : Throughout the course of the season, BlueRock Energy will air exclusive promotions, advertisements and offers on WFAN, the official radio station of the Brooklyn Nets. Additionally, BlueRock Energy's signature blue and orange logo and colors will shine brightly throughout Barclays Center's state-of-the-art ribbon boards, end zone LED boards, basket stanchions and arena bowl entryways. "We're thrilled to be back at Barclays Center as a Proud Supporting Partner of the Brooklyn Nets for a second consecutive season of NBA basketball," said Phil VanHorne , CEO of BlueRock Energy. "We can't wait to support the Nets and their loyal fans across the New York Metro region, as well as all of the local businesses who get behind the team."
"BlueRock is an integral part of our family of corporate sponsors," said Brooklyn Sports & Entertainment Executive Vice President of Global Partnerships, Michael Zavodsky . "As we enter into our second season with BlueRock, we're excited to expand our partnership beyond the Brooklyn Nets to include the New York Islanders as they begin their first season of play in Brooklyn ."
For more information on BlueRock Energy and to follow the exclusive promotions, offers and interactive content they'll be collaborating on with the Brooklyn Nets all season long, please visit www.bluerockenergy.com and BlueRock Energy's Facebook and Twitter pages.
ABOUT BLUEROCK ENERGY:
BlueRock Energy is a privately held energy solutions company that provides electricity, natural gas and renewable energy products to more than 16,000 customers across New York State , Connecticut and Pennsylvania . The team at BlueRock provides businesses and residential customers with unique energy plans designed to keep it simple while reducing costs. To learn more about BlueRock Energy, please visit www.bluerockenergy.com .
Media Contact: North 6th Agency, Inc. (For BlueRock Energy)
212-334-9753, BlueRock@n6a.com
